condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: D?ici 2021, les enfants, les femmes et leurs familles en milieu rural et urbain ont un acces ameliore et durable a l'assainissementet ont des pratiques d'hygiene contribuant a une bonne sante.

description.narrative: In 2021, UNICEF&39;s advocacy and technical support enabled progress regarding rural sanitation through Community Approaches to Total Sanitation (CATS) in the country. As a result of UNICEF direct support, 250 new localities were triggered this year and a total of 43,913 additional people gained access to basic sanitation and 26,348 installed their own handwashing stations in 65 newly open defecation free verified localities. With these additional beneficiaries, 88% of the target for the CPD 2017-2021 is reached.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:16/01/2022
